DOC.detailed_description: A mobile environment improve process integrate treatment obese people identify , develop , introduce clinically evaluate . The study include 150 patient age 25 65 men 25 70 woman , diagnose obesity ( BMI≥30 BMI > 27,5 20 % risk develop cardiovascular disease ) . One group patient visit conventional live workshop weight loss group use ICT . At initial examination doctor survey participant measure blood pressure , body mass , waist circumference , percentage body fat , percentage skeletal muscle , rest metabolic rate , estimate risk develop cardiovascular disease direct laboratory examination ( blood lipid cholesterol , blood sugar ) . Both group go 16 workshop weight loss . Each week monitor body mass , waist circumference , physical activity ( type , duration , intensity ) food intake ( type , quantity ) . After six month survey participant examine . We compare effectiveness ICT weight loss group conventional weight loss group .
